words.ex: The iconoclast challenged long‑held assumptions in the field.
Her idiosyncratic style made her work instantly recognizable.
He refused to engage in such ignoble behavior.
The team suffered an ignominious defeat.
The investigation uncovered an illicit trade network.
She followed in the footsteps of her illustrious predecessors.
Students eagerly imbibed the professor’s insights.
The political imbroglio dominated the headlines for weeks.
Her reasoning was immaculate and left no room for doubt.
The objection was deemed immaterial to the case.
They faced an immense challenge with limited resources.
The ritual required them to immolate symbolic offerings.
The laws of physics are considered immutable.
Negotiations reached an impasse after neither side would compromise.
Her impeccable logic impressed the entire panel.
He spent his impecunious youth studying in libraries.
Technical issues impeded the progress of the project.
A sense of duty impelled her to speak out.
The text was so dense it felt almost impenetrable.
It is imperative to address the issue immediately.
His imperious tone irritated the entire team.
She remained impervious to criticism.
His impetuous decision caused unnecessary complications.
The new rules impinge on personal freedoms.
They faced an implacable opponent who refused to yield.
The agreement carried implicit expectations.
The company imploded after years of mismanagement.
She implored them to reconsider their stance.
It would be impolitic to comment publicly at this stage.
Reporters importuned him for a statement.
The imposing structure dominated the skyline.
The fortress was considered impregnable.
They held an impromptu meeting in the hallway.
His improvident habits led to financial trouble.
She improvised a solution when the equipment failed.
He impugned the credibility of the witness.
The debate devolved into inane bickering.
The institute inaugurated a new research center.
Her incandescent performance captivated the audience.
The ritual began with a whispered incantation.
The injury incapacitated him for several months.
His incendiary remarks sparked outrage.
The incessant noise made concentration impossible.
Their inchoate plan needed significant refinement.
Her incisive analysis clarified the issue.
He had no inclination to join the discussion.
His explanation was so incoherent that no one understood.
The modern sculpture looked incongruous in the old square.
The data provided incontrovertible proof of the claim.
He remained an incorrigible optimist despite repeated setbacks.
